channel.title: CVE Feed for WAGO -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WAGO -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-8836|2024-08-05T07:02:26.244Z -- wago -- wago%20750%20series
item.description: Wago 750 Series PLCs with firmware version 10 and prior include a remote attack may take advantage of an improper implementation of the 3 way handshake during a TCP connection affecting the communications with commission and service tools. Specially crafted packets may also be sent to Port 2455/TCP/IP, used in Codesys management software, which may result in a denial-of-service condition of communications with commissioning and service tools.

item.title: CVE-2018-25090|2024-08-05T15:22:05.933Z -- wago -- controller%20bacnet%2Fip
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use an XSS attack due to improper neutralization of input during web page generation. User interaction is required. This leads to a limited impact of confidentiality and integrity but no impact of availability.

item.title: CVE-2018-25090|2024-08-05T12:33:48.504Z -- wago -- controller%20bacnet%2Fip
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use an XSS attack due to improper neutralization of input during web page generation. User interaction is required. This leads to a limited impact of confidentiality and integrity but no impact of availability.
